full_text:
Let's check out Chiefs offensive formations in their shellacking of the Raiders this week. KC killed in 12p and 13p. RoJo with 15 snaps! I think he tripled his season total. Watson and Toney splitting the 11p snaps, along with JuJu and MVS. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/yUtUUeAzfc

Defense next. KC repelled the raiders in 3-2-6 and 3-3-5 personnel. 4-2-5 was ugly though. Ah well... Nothing surprising about this, but Watson is your 5th DB, and Cook is the 6th. No rotation there. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/1xTcHadY19

Here's the Raiders charts. Wow, that's bad. 21p was teh only formation with reasonable snaps that had positive EPA. And they were TERRIBLE in 12p!!! On defense, their 4-1-6 an 4-2-5 formations gave up unbelievably large amounts of EPA. 

#nflverse #rstats #shellackingtheraiders https://t.co/2YcWBK0YeG
